description: Microsoft's Azure AI Foundry will soon include OpenAI's text-to-video model, Sora, addressing a current gap compared to AWS and Google Cloud. Read more...
title: Microsoft to bring OpenAI's Sora video generation API to Azure AI Foundry next week

description: Harvard Law School has revealed how it determined that the Magna Carta, which it had paid under $28 for, was the real deal. Read more...
title: Harvard unknowingly paid just over $27 for a real "Magna Carta" from centuries ago

description: Microsoft dropped two more Windows 11 preview builds today, and they contain quite a lot of new stuff, such as AI actions in File Explorer, redesigned widgets, improved energy saver, and more. Read more...
title: Windows 11 gets AI actions in File Explorer, redesigned widgets, and more in new builds

description: With AI's influence under scrutiny, a tool has emerged that attempts to de-radicalize radical Reddit users, raising red flags about who decides what 'radical' actually means. Read more...
title: Ideological warfare: Student builds AI tool to de-radicalize extremists on Reddit

description: Microsoft is rolling out an emergency update for Windows 10 users to address BitLocker recovery boot loops. Read more...
title: Windows 10 emergency update KB5061768 fixes BitLocker boot loops

description: In this patch are mainly regression fixes for Command Palette, Workspaces, and Quick Accent, where in one case Command Palette is run as Admin instead of the user. Read more...
title: PowerToys v0.91.1 brings fixes for Command Palette, Workspaces, and Quick Accent

description: It's the launch day of the RTX 5060, and Nvidia has released the 576.52 Game Ready drivers for the latest GeForce graphics card. Read more...
title: Nvidia 576.52 driver adds support RTX 5060, also brings more bug fixes

description: Microsoft is rolling out a new Windows 11 preview build, which packs HDR improvements, new AI features, fresh keyboard shortcuts, and more. Read more...
title: Windows 11 gets more AI stuff, new shortcuts, HDR improvements, and more in build 26100.4188

description: Hours ahead of the Google I/O event, the NotebookLM app is live on the Google Play Store for Android users. Read more...
title: You can already download Google NotebookLM on Android hours before its official launch

description: The gameplay of the next installment in the Anno franchise has finally arrived. Ubisoft has shown off Anno 117: Pax Romana's start, as well as its city-building and management mechanics. Read more...
title: Anno 117 first gameplay unveiled as Ubisoft attaches a release window to the city builder

description: Get rid of annoying and intrusive ads and protect your device from malware with this advanced ad blocking app. Read more...
title: AdGuard Family lifetime subscription is now 76% off

description: Dell has unveiled its new "most powerful laptop" in the form of the Pro Max Plus AI PC. The company has explained how it is made possible with the discrete enterprise-grade Qualcomm NPU. Read more...
title: Dell Pro Max Plus is its "most powerful laptop" to help you get cloud AI performance at home

description: Samsung's Q990F is the new flagship soundbar from the company in 2025, and it has received its first big discount, knocking off $400 from its price. Read more...
title: Samsung Q990F 11.1.4 Dolby Atmos 2025 soundbar with wireless subwoofer gets first discount

description: OnePlus has announced that its new Android tablet, the OnePlus Pad 3, will launch soon with several cool new features. Read more...
title: OnePlus Pad 3 incoming on June 5 with seamless iOS syncing

description: Microsoft is bringing Model Context Protocol (MCP) to Windows 11 to turn its OS into an agentic OS. At BUILD 2025, it outlined how its implementation will be secure. Read more...
title: Microsoft is bringing Model Context Protocol to Windows 11 to make it an agentic OS

description: Microsoft, at its BUILD 2025 developer conference, has unveiled NLWeb, a new tool that lets web publishers get in on the emerging agentic web. Read more...
title: Microsoft unveils NLWeb letting web publishers participate in the agentic web

description: Microsoft's GitHub has introduced the GitHub Copilot coding agent that can autonomously complete software development tasks in a secure environment. Read more...
title: Microsoft takes on OpenAI Codex with the new GitHub Copilot coding agent

description: Microsoft announced a set of new Windows 11 features for developers and enthusiasts, including a new command-line text editor, a reworked "Advanced Settings" section, and more. Read more...
title: Windows 11 is getting a new command-line text editor, advanced settings, and more

description: The Microsoft Store on Windows 11 and 10 is getting a lot of important changes, including the long-awaited "last updated," free developer registration, and other upgrades. Read more...
title: Microsoft Store finally gets 'last updated' for apps, direct Win32 updates, and more

description: Microsoft has announced that it's beginning to put quantum encryption algorithms into Windows so that developers can start using them. It is designed to keep data safe from future quantum computers. Read more...
title: Microsoft is now putting quantum encryption in Windows builds

description: Microsoft has added some AI APIs to Edge Canary and Dev, to make the net better for everyone with LLMs built into the browser. It wants to work with other browser vendors to turn these into standards. Read more...
title: Microsoft proposes new AI API web standards at Build 2025

description: Microsoft has unveiled Microsoft Discovery, a new enterprise AI platform designed to accelerate research and discovery for enterprises and labs. Read more...
title: The new Microsoft Discovery agentic platform targets scientists and researchers

description: SQL Server 2025 is shaping up to be a pivotal release offering robust tools for developers and improved core database capabilities. Read more...
title: Microsoft announces public preview of SQL Server 2025

description: Microsoft has a free and official GitHub for Teams app, and the software is now generally available to everyone. Read more...
title: Microsoft's free official GitHub Teams app gets faster and is now available for everyone

description: Microsoft has unveiled Windows AI Foundry at Build 2025, a comprehensive platform designed to simplify local AI development on Windows. Read more...
title: Microsoft introduces Windows AI Foundry, a unified platform for local AI development

description: Microsoft is expanding its Azure AI Foundry by adding xAI's Grok 3 and Grok 3 Mini models. New features include a Model Router for automatic OpenAI model selection. Read more...
title: Microsoft brings xAI's Grok 3 and Grok 3 mini models to Azure AI Foundry

description: At Build 2025, Microsoft unveiled Microsoft 365 Copilot Tuning, enabling organizations to train AI models with their data for domain-specific tasks. Read more...
title: Microsoft announces Copilot Tuning, enabling organizations to train models using their data

description: Microsoft has made its Windows Subsystem for Linux open source. The announcement was made as its BUILD 2025 developer conference. Read more...
title: Microsoft open-sources Windows Subsystem for Linux ahead of 10-year anniversary

description: Microsoft is taking PDF translation to the next level. The feature will now be able to translate full documents with "just a few clicks." M365 Copilot features like Agents are also coming. Read more...
title: Microsoft Edge getting full document PDF translation. Summaries, task automation also coming

description: Microsoft is introducing new Web Content Filtering (WCF) on Edge for Business on both Windows 11 and 10, and the feature is 'free'. Read more...
title: Microsoft shares info on Edge for Business 'free' content filtering on Windows 11 and 10

description: Microsoft is making Administrator protection on Windows 11 even better with some cool new changes to how it works. Read more...
title: Windows 11 Administrator protection gets even better, Microsoft explains how

description: Microsoft has decided to open source its GitHub Copilot tool in Visual Studio Code. It has also shared some exciting developments. Read more...
title: Microsoft open sources GitHub Copilot in Visual Studio Code

description: JetBrains's AI Assistant is no longer limited to its own IDEs. It is now available as an extension for VS Code. Read more...
title: JetBrains AI Assistant lands on Visual Studio Code as an extension

description: A fast, hands-on introduction to offensive hacking techniques, normally worth $45 can now be downloaded for free for a limited time. Read more...
title: Hands on Hacking eBook (worth $45) now free to download

description: Xiaomi is trying again at in-house chips after releasing one back in 2017 but failing to launch a successor, now investing over $5 billion with a new chip unveiling expected Thursday. Read more...
title: Xiaomi re-enters in-house chip game with deeper pockets, expect an unveil this Thursday

description: Samsung has announced that its 2025 OLED TV lineup will feature support for NVIDIA G-SYNC to reduce artifacts, alongside other features, allowing for peak performance in demanding games. Read more...
title: Samsung announces NVIDIA G-SYNC support for 2025 OLED TV lineup

description: Ubisoft is soon opening up Rainbow Six Siege X to PC players in the test server ahead of the full launch. Here are the updated system requirements for the upgraded shooter and more details. Read more...
title: Ubisoft unveils Siege X year 10 roadmap, new PC and console requirements, and more details

description: Nvidia has announced its latest GPU, the Blackwell Ultra, made to train the next generation of AI models. Read more...
title: Nvidia announces its most powerful GPU, the Blackwell Ultra, built for training agentic AI

description: Vivaldi's latest feature update is here to improve keyboard shortcut controls and make the address bar better. Read more...
title: Vivaldi 7.4 is out with improved keyboard shortcut and address bar controls

description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang unveiled NVLink Fusion, a customer silicon for handling bandwidth between AI systems, at the Computex 2025 event Read more...
title: Nvidia announces new NVLink Fusion that delivers 14x the bandwidth of PCIe Gen5

description: Google's AI tool, Illuminate, is getting new features, including one called "Spark" that lets users generate short explainer videos from just a written prompt. Read more...
title: Google's upcoming Sparks feature in Illuminate produces TikTok-style explainer videos

description: Microsoft is improving Google's Chrome in one aspect to make it as good as Edge is. The company is working on blocking Admin rights. Read more...
title: Microsoft finally making Google Chrome as good as Edge by blocking Admin rights

description: A new report suggests upcoming changes might challenge Siri's dominance on Apple devices in the EU region. Read more...
title: Report: Siri might loose the crown of iPhone's exclusive voice assistant in the EU

description: A rare translucent prototype of Apple's Powerbeats Pro 2 has surfaced, giving a glimpse at the complex internals. Read more...
title: Leaked images reveal Apple's translucent design approach for Powerbeats Pro 2

description: Linus Torvalds has released the seventh release candidate of Linux 6.15. He said last week was eventful but brought under control, meaning Linux 6.15 is very likely next week. Read more...
title: LInus Torvalds says Linux 6.15 very likely next week, releases rc7
